story.title: A tradition of taste for over 30 years
story.p1: Since its opening in 1993, Saeyoungdong Galbi has been a beloved destination for Jecheon citizens, preserving its traditional flavors through two generations.
story.p2: Our commitment to using only carefully selected Hanwoo beef and domestic ingredients, combined with warm hospitality, has been our most precious value for over three decades.
story.quote: Experience the authentic flavors within the clean touch of tradition.
